argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | c0mhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 2 |  | c0mhm.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` T ) |
| 3 |  | c0mhm.h | |- H = ( x e. B |-> .0. ) |
| 4 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( S e. Grp -> S e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( T e. Grp -> T e. Mnd ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( S e. Mnd /\ T e. Mnd ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_c0mhm | |- ( ( S e. Mnd /\ T e. Mnd ) -> H e. ( S MndHom T ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> H e. ( S MndHom T ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ghmmhmb | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( S GrpHom T ) = ( S MndHom T ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( H e. ( S GrpHom T ) <-> H e. ( S MndHom T ) ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> H e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
